search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Pivotal Tracker (pivotal-tracker.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for Pivotal Tracker can be found here: [https://www.pivotaltracker.com/pricing](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/pricing) .

extracted_content.content:

It's also free for public projects, educators, and nonprofits
-------------------------------------------------------------

![Image 54: Pivotal Tracker Pandemic projects logo](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/marketing_assets/pricing/pandemic-17ad2d73b93b4eac06d0c8d6dfc72900fcfa5731f3aa6f50e99ae41b38fd29cf.svg)

#### Accept stories, reject germs

We're here to help those who are working to end this Pandemic.  
[Simply drop us a line](mailto:support@pivotaltracker.com).

![Image 55: Pivotal Tracker Education logo](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/marketing_assets/pricing/school-1d0ac8ca7ea756f59d07b4b14c1d69398ec3fc6163ddd2579f87d17f1fa17c1b.svg)

#### Cool for school

We provide sponsored ([free](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/free/)) accounts for educators at accredited academic institutions [by request](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/help/articles/other_free_options/#sponsored-plans-for-nonprofit-or-academic-institutions). They include unlimited private projects.

![Image 56: Pivotal Tracker Nonprofit logo](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/marketing_assets/pricing/nonprofit-54825b3a58c6e8511a72634bb3d3adf66d4a01fa6beb85d13f294f3a2527c3a1.svg)

#### Also cool for nonprofits

Free plans are also [available](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/help/articles/other_free_options/#sponsored-plans-for-nonprofit-or-academic-institutions) for qualified, tax-exempt nonprofit organizations. They include unlimited private projects.

![Image 57: Pivotal Tracker Public projects logo](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/marketing_assets/pricing/public-76b597f85e26b8ec6124b57cb2fff47f4791ce1973e7664208eeac4cbe1faf79.svg)

#### Make it public

Show the world what you're doing: [Public projects](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/help/articles/using_public_projects/) are [free](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/free/), publicly visible, and the collaborators do not count toward plan limits.

[Contact us for more information.](mailto:support@pivotaltracker.com)

### Frequently Asked Questions

#### How does the 30-day free trial work?

When you sign up for Pivotal Tracker, your first account will be automatically enrolled in the 30-day free trial, which allows you to use all features, create an unlimited number of projects, and invite as many people to those projects as you'd like. You can begin upgrading to an Enterprise plan at any time before the end of the 30-day period. Otherwise, at the end of the free trial, your account will transition to the free plan, which allows up to five private projects and five collaborators (including yourself). If your account is over these limits, your projects will become read-only.

#### What are the available subscription options?

Start with [a 30-day free trial free plan](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/help/articles/signup_try_tracker/), and then continue with either a free plan (5 collaborators, 5 projects), or upgrade to Enterprise!

#### What does the term "collaborator" mean?

This is the total number of unique Tracker users that you can invite to the private projects in your account with read/write project access. A given user only counts once, regardless of the number of private projects in your account that he or she is a member of. Read-only members (viewers) and members of public projects do not count toward project collaborator limits.

#### What types of payments do you accept?

Enterprise plans are paid via PO and invoice. Our account executives will guide you through the process and confirm your organization has what it needs. [Get in touch](mailto:support@pivotaltracker.com) about an Enterprise plan.

**Need more information?** Please see our [Help Center](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/help), or contact us by [email](mailto:support@pivotaltracker.com).

Cookies
-------

Broadcom and third-party partners use technology, including cookies to, among other things, analyze site usage, improve your experience and help us advertise. By using our site, you agree to our use of cookies as described in our [Cookie Notice](https://www.broadcom.com/company/legal/cookie-policy)

Cookies Settings

![Image 59: Company Logo](https://cdn.cookielaw.org/logos/8153b982-ae11-46a0-b7c2-6e4e3b591d72/8a37f712-8eb0-4967-9ca7-343409702cfa/5228da75-715f-4d1a-9262-2662775eb1ce/Broadcom_Logo_Red-Black_no-tag.png)

Privacy Preference Center
-------------------------

*   ### Your Privacy
    
*   ### Strictly Necessary Cookies
    
*   ### Performance Cookies
    

#### Your Privacy

When you interact with Broadcom as set forth in the Privacy Policy through visiting any website, it may store or retrieve information on your browser, mostly in the form of cookies. This information might be about you, your preferences or your device and is mostly used to make the site work as you expect it to. The information does not usually directly identify you, but it can give you a more personalized web experience.  
[Cookie Policy](https://www.broadcom.com/company/legal/privacy/cookie-policy)[Privacy Policy](https://www.broadcom.com/company/legal/privacy/policy)

#### Strictly Necessary Cookies

Always Active

These cookies are necessary for the website to function and cannot be switched off in Broadcom’s systems. They are usually only set in response to actions made by you which amount to a request for services, such as setting your privacy preferences, logging in or filling in forms. You can set your browser to block or alert you about these cookies, but some parts of the site will not then work. These cookies do not store any personally identifiable information.

#### Performance Cookies

 Performance Cookies

These cookies allow Broadcom to count visits and traffic sources so Broadcom can measure and improve the performance of its site. They help Broadcom to know which pages are the most and least popular and see how visitors move around the site. All information these cookies collect is aggregated and therefore anonymous. If you do not allow these cookies Broadcom will not know when you have visited our site and will not be able to monitor its performance.

View Pivotal Tracker pricing plans. Schools, nonprofits, and teams up to five stay free, while teams of all sizes can try Tracker free for 30 days.

pricing_data.pricing_notes: The Enterprise plan is currently unavailable. Free plans are available for public projects, educators, and nonprofits.
